mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM s_role WHERE 1=1 AND NAME_ LIKE '%'||#{name}||'%'

SELECT r.ID_ roleId, r.CODE_ roleCode, r.NAME_ roleName, mi.ID_ menuItemId, mi.PID_ pid, mi.NAME_ menuItemName, mi.ICON_ icon, mi.URL_ url FROM s_role r LEFT JOIN s_role_menu_item ri ON r.ID_=ri.ROLE_ID_ LEFT JOIN s_menu_item mi ON ri.MENU_ITEM_ID_=mi.ID_ WHERE r.CODE_=#{roleCode}

SELECT mi.ID_ menuItemId, mi.PID_ pid, mi.NAME_ menuItemName, mi.ICON_ icon, mi.URL_ url FROM s_menu_item mi LEFT JOIN s_role_menu_item rmi ON mi.ID_=rmi.MENU_ITEM_ID_ LEFT JOIN s_role r ON rmi.ROLE_ID_=r.ID_ WHERE rm.ROLE_ID_=#{roleId}
